system.description:
Effect: Set-Up: The user may freely move,using a Movement Score of their choice, and gains Braced 1.
Resolution: On their next activation, the user attacks with and resolve Ice Burn. On hit, all valid targets have a 30% chance of becoming @Affliction[burn] 5.

actions.name: Ice Burn
actions.description:
